message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7500. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6800. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

I understand you're interested in the product, and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $6800. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my original offer and your offer, so I'll counter with $7200. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $7000. I'm willing to go up to $7000, but no higher. Can you consider that?

I understand you're getting close to your limit, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $7000. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'll counter with $7100. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll be happy with the price.
I'm really close to my limit, but I'm still a bit above $7000. I'm willing to meet you at $7050, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that?
